title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.
actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler

title: Schindler's List
plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
actors: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley, Caroline Goodall

title: Raging Bull
plot: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.
actors: Robert De Niro, Cathy Moriarty, Joe Pesci, Frank Vincent

title: Casablanca
plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.
actors: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains

title: Citizen Kane
plot: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'
actors: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Dorothy Comingore, Agnes Moorehead

title: Gone with the Wind
plot: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.
actors: George Cukor, Sam Wood, Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell, Barbara O'Neil

title: The Wizard of Oz
plot: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz, and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.
actors: King Vidor, Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger, Bert Lahr

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
plot: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.
actors: Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco

title: Lawrence of Arabia
plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.
actors: Peter O'Toole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn, Jack Hawkins

title: Vertigo
plot: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.
actors: James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes, Tom Helmore

title: Psycho
plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
actors: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, John Gavin

title: The Godfather Part II
plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
actors: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton

title: On the Waterfront
plot: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.
actors: Marlon Brando, Karl Malden, Lee J. Cobb, Rod Steiger

title: Sunset Boulevard
plot: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.
actors: William Holden, Gloria Swanson, Erich von Stroheim, Nancy Olson

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field

title: The Sound of Music
plot: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.
actors: Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker, Richard Haydn

title: 12 Angry Men
plot: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
actors: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam, John Fiedler

title: West Side Story
plot: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.
actors: Robert Wise, Natalie Wood, George Chakiris, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn

title: Жұлдызды соғыстар: Эпизод IV - Жаңа үміт
plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
plot: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins: a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer HAL 9000.
actors: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester, Daniel Richter

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.
actors: Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Peter Coyote, Dee Wallace

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
actors: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn, Ted Levine

title: Chinatown
plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.
actors: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston, Perry Lopez

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
plot: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.
actors: William Holden, Alec Guinness, Jack Hawkins, Sessue Hayakawa

title: Singin' in the Rain
plot: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.
actors: Gene Kelly, Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor, Debbie Reynolds, Jean Hagen

title: It's a Wonderful Life
plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.
actors: James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Thomas Mitchell

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
plot: An unhinged American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
actors: Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden, Keenan Wynn

title: Some Like It Hot
plot: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.
actors: Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis, Jack Lemmon, George Raft

title: Ben-Hur
plot: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
actors: Charlton Heston, Jack Hawkins, Stephen Boyd, Haya Harareet

title: Apocalypse Now
plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.
actors: Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando, Robert Duvall, Frederic Forrest

title: Amadeus
plot: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.
actors: F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce, Elizabeth Berridge, Roy Dotrice

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
actors: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
actors: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed

title: Титаник
plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates

title: From Here to Eternity
plot: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his commanding officer's wife and top aide begin a tentative affair.
actors: Burt Lancaster, Montgomery Clift, Deborah Kerr, Donna Reed

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
actors: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns

title: Unforgiven
plot: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."
actors: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman, Richard Harris

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, John Rhys-Davies

title: Rocky
plot: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
actors: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers

title: A Streetcar Named Desire
plot: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.
actors: Vivien Leigh, Marlon Brando, Kim Hunter, Karl Malden

title: The Philadelphia Story
plot: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.
actors: Cary Grant, Katharine Hepburn, James Stewart, Ruth Hussey

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
plot: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a Black man against an undeserved rape charge, and tries to educate his young children against prejudice.
actors: Gregory Peck, John Megna, Frank Overton, Rosemary Murphy

title: An American in Paris
plot: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.
actors: Gene Kelly, Leslie Caron, Oscar Levant, Georges Guétary

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
plot: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.
actors: Myrna Loy, Dana Andrews, Fredric March, Teresa Wright

title: My Fair Lady
plot: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.
actors: Audrey Hepburn, Rex Harrison, Stanley Holloway, Wilfrid Hyde-White

title: A Clockwork Orange
plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
actors: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates, Warren Clarke

title: Doctor Zhivago
plot: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.
actors: Omar Sharif, Julie Christie, Geraldine Chaplin, Rod Steiger

title: The Searchers
plot: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.
actors: John Wayne, Jeffrey Hunter, Vera Miles, Ward Bond

title: Jaws
plot: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.
actors: Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss, Lorraine Gary

title: Patton
plot: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.
actors: George C. Scott, Karl Malden, Stephen Young, Michael Strong

title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
plot: In 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid lead a band of outlaws. When a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. After considering their options, they escape to South America.
actors: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Katharine Ross, Strother Martin

title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
plot: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.
actors: Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston, Tim Holt, Bruce Bennett

title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
actors: Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef, Aldo Giuffrè

title: The Apartment
plot: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.
actors: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine, Fred MacMurray, Ray Walston

title: Platoon
plot: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.
actors: Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger, Willem Dafoe, Keith David

title: High Noon
plot: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.
actors: Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Thomas Mitchell, Lloyd Bridges

title: Braveheart
plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.
actors: Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan, Angus Macfadyen

title: Dances with Wolves
plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.
actors: Kevin Costner, Mary McDonnell, Graham Greene, Rodney A. Grant

title: Jurassic Park
plot: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough

title: The Exorcist
plot: When a young girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.
actors: Ellen Burstyn, Max von Sydow, Linda Blair, Lee J. Cobb

title: The Pianist
plot: During WWII, acclaimed Polish musician Wladyslaw faces various struggles as he loses contact with his family. As the situation worsens, he hides in the ruins of Warsaw in order to survive.
actors: Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay, Emilia Fox

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.
actors: Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco

title: The Deer Hunter
plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.
actors: Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken, John Cazale, John Savage

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
plot: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.
actors: Lew Ayres, Louis Wolheim, John Wray, Arnold Lucy

title: Bonnie and Clyde
plot: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.
actors: Warren Beatty, Faye Dunaway, Michael J. Pollard, Gene Hackman

title: The French Connection
plot: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.
actors: Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey, Tony Lo Bianco

title: City Lights
plot: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.
actors: Charles Chaplin, Virginia Cherrill, Florence Lee, Harry Myers

title: It Happened One Night
plot: A rogue reporter trailing a runaway heiress for a big story joins her on a bus heading from Florida to New York and they end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops along the way.
actors: Clark Gable, Claudette Colbert, Walter Connolly, Roscoe Karns

title: A Place in the Sun
plot: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.
actors: Montgomery Clift, Elizabeth Taylor, Shelley Winters, Anne Revere

title: Midnight Cowboy
plot: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.
actors: Dustin Hoffman, Jon Voight, Sylvia Miles, John McGiver

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
plot: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.
actors: James Stewart, Jean Arthur, Claude Rains, Edward Arnold

title: Rain Man
plot: After a selfish L.A. yuppie learns his estranged father left a fortune to an autistic-savant brother in Ohio that he didn't know existed, he absconds with his brother and sets out across the country, hoping to gain a larger inheritance.
actors: Dustin Hoffman, Tom Cruise, Valeria Golino, Gerald R. Molen

title: Annie Hall
plot: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.
actors: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Tony Roberts, Carol Kane

title: Fargo
plot: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.
actors: Ethan Coen, William H. Macy, Frances McDormand, Steve Buscemi, Peter Stormare

title: Giant
plot: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.
actors: Elizabeth Taylor, Rock Hudson, James Dean, Carroll Baker

title: Shane
plot: A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.
actors: Alan Ladd, Jean Arthur, Van Heflin, Brandon De Wilde

title: The Grapes of Wrath
plot: An Oklahoma family, driven off their farm by the poverty and hopelessness of the Dust Bowl, joins the westward migration to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.
actors: Henry Fonda, Jane Darwell, John Carradine, Charley Grapewin

title: The Green Mile
plot: A tale set on death row, where gentle giant John Coffey possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul Edgecombe, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.
actors: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt

title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
plot: Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches.
actors: Richard Dreyfuss, François Truffaut, Teri Garr, Melinda Dillon

title: Nashville
plot: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.
actors: Keith Carradine, Karen Black, Ronee Blakley, Shelley Duvall

title: Network
plot: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.
actors: Faye Dunaway, William Holden, Peter Finch, Robert Duvall

title: The Graduate
plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.
actors: Dustin Hoffman, Anne Bancroft, Katharine Ross, William Daniels

title: American Graffiti
plot: A group of teenagers in California's central valley spend one final night after their 1962 high school graduation cruising the strip with their buddies before they pursue their varying goals.
actors: Richard Dreyfuss, Ron Howard, Paul Le Mat, Charles Martin Smith

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis

title: Terms of Endearment
plot: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love and her daughter's family problems.
actors: Shirley MacLaine, Debra Winger, Jack Nicholson, Danny DeVito

title: Good Will Hunting
plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
actors: Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård

title: The African Queen
plot: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling Canadian riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced English missionary to undertake a trip up a treacherous river and use his boat to attack a German gunship.
actors: Humphrey Bogart, Katharine Hepburn, Robert Morley, Peter Bull

title: Stagecoach
plot: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.
actors: John Wayne, Claire Trevor, Andy Devine, John Carradine

title: Mutiny on the Bounty
plot: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1789 mutiny.
actors: Charles Laughton, Clark Gable, Franchot Tone, Herbert Mundin

title: The Great Dictator
plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.
actors: Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Jack Oakie, Reginald Gardiner

title: Double Indemnity
plot: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.
actors: Fred MacMurray, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward G. Robinson, Byron Barr

title: The Maltese Falcon
plot: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.
actors: Humphrey Bogart, Mary Astor, Gladys George, Peter Lorre

title: Wuthering Heights
plot: A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.
actors: Merle Oberon, Laurence Olivier, David Niven, Flora Robson

title: Taxi Driver
plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.
actors: Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd, Albert Brooks

title: Rear Window
plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window and, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend, becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
actors: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey, Thelma Ritter

title: The Third Man
plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.
actors: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli, Trevor Howard

title: Rebel Without a Cause
plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.
actors: James Dean, Natalie Wood, Sal Mineo, Jim Backus

title: North by Northwest
plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.
actors: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason, Jessie Royce Landis

title: Yankee Doodle Dandy
plot: The life of the renowned musical composer, playwright, actor, dancer, and singer George M. Cohan.
actors: James Cagney, Joan Leslie, Walter Huston, Richard Whorf
